snippet: Serena Williams made the most of a break in her match against 13th seed Svetlana Kuznetsova on Monday, when the Centre Court roof was closed after she threatened to sue organizers if she fell and injured herself on the slippery turf....
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams made the most of a break in her match against 13th seed Svetlana Kuznetsova on Monday, when the Centre Court roof was closed after she threatened to sue organizers if she fell and injured herself on the slippery turf.

headline.print_headline: Serena Powers Into Quarters as Roof Break Turns Match
headline.main: Serena Powers Into Quarters as Roof Break Turns Match
